EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-08-15-Cloud Migration Demo.ES-2018-08-08-Cloud Migration Business Case
EmailTemplate.subject: WEBINAR: Making a Business Case for Your Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Deciding to migrate your workloads to AWS or Azure theoretically takes no time at all, but creating an accurate plan and business case manually to justify this decision can take months.
Please join us for a live demonstration illustrating how Turbonomic makes it easy to create a cloud migration plan, from assessing the on-premises estate to building a detailed migration timeline, and everything in between.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]>
In this 30-minute presentation, we will teach you a new approach to deliver the fastest, most accurate business case for cloud migration.
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Megan
